[/quote]

Wat do u think this is javascript?[/quote]

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:12, topic:513335”]try this…

                                        if (MyShopID == 19 || MyShopID == 18) {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd);
                                        } else if (MyShopID !== 19 || MyShopID !== 18) {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
                                        } else {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
    }

this might work, not used to coding delta… but try it[/quote]
Hey look. You took what runescape sucks and I said and put it in the code.
You must feel amazing.

try this…

                                        if (MyShopID == 19 || MyShopID == 18) {

                                        } else if (MyShopID !== 19 || MyShopID !== 18) {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
                                        } else {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
    }

this might work, not used to coding delta… but try it

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:8, topic:513335”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=631581.msg4275057#msg4275057 date=1364869133]
[/quote]
He’s saying that your shops can not be 18 and 19 at the same time, you have to use || not &&.

|| = or
&& = and[/quote]
will you marry me lol thanks i have to keep this down somewhere

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

MrFun:

MyShopID 18 & 19 still says coins…this is weird

He’s saying that your shops can not be 18 and 19 at the same time, you have to use || not &&.

|| = or
&& = and

Read full topic

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Then it’s this:

                                        if (MyShopID == 19 && MyShopID == 18) {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd);
                                        } else {
            sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
                                        }

It says if myShopID is 19 and myShopId is 18 it costs x points. Else it shows coins.

Read full topic

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:

[quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631581.msg4275022#msg4275022 date=1364868078]

You didn’t set the items to be taken as special value…[/quote]
What you mean? The items in the point shops take the points and the items not in the point shop take coins…its the visual part that is messed up

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:3, topic:513335”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=631581.msg4275010#msg4275010 date=1364867696]

You didn’t set the items to take tokens. You just changed the points.
Don’t ask me how to fix, I don’t know how to do it for Delta.
[/quote]
Here you go, to problem is that it says for all items not in either point shop (MyShopID 19 the other point shop) says something like this “currently costs 30000000 points (30 million)”, you can tell that is suppose to be coins not points[/quote]
You didn’t set the items to be taken as special value…

item.source: Confused on whats going on with this code

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:1, topic:513335”]I decided to add a pk shop and it went good I thought…all the items were in the point system, until today I check a different shop and saw it said a item cost how ever many points, yet it took gp
heres my code for my shop (ShopID 18 is my pk shop, yet items not in the pk shop still show points at the end)

if (MyShopID == 19 && MyShopID == 18) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } else { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }
where it says “coins” I can change that too points or coins then it changes how much the other items are, yet still run their value if they are in or not in the shop. What I mean is if they are in shop 18 they run off of the pk points if they are not in the shop they run off of coins.
How do I fix this?[/quote]
You didn’t set the items to take tokens. You just changed the points.
Don’t ask me how to fix, I don’t know how to do it for Delta.

Read full topic
item.source: Confused on whats going on with this code

item.title: Confused on whats going on with this code
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I decided to add a pk shop and it went good I thought…all the items were in the point system, until today I check a different shop and saw it said a item cost how ever many points, yet it took gp
heres my code for my shop (ShopID 18 is my pk shop, yet items not in the pk shop still show points at the end)

if (MyShopID == 19 && MyShopID == 18) { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" points"+ShopAdd); } else { sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd); }
where it says “coins” I can change that too points or coins then it changes how much the other items are, yet still run their value if they are in or not in the shop. What I mean is if they are in shop 18 they run off of the pk points if they are not in the shop they run off of coins.
How do I fix this?

update
heres the part where it takes the points

if (MyShopID == 18) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough points for this item."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Confused on whats going on with this code
